name: Ponderosa
tagline: At Ponderosa Our Approach Is Very Simple.
description:
Creating Difference. It’s what we do.
Whether it’s reinvigorating a brand through NPD, repositioning or relaunching, or changing consumer perception and consideration, everything we do is about creating difference. 
We create and launch brands, promoting them online, through social media, television, and the press.

locations.address: Studio 1, Cross York Street Studios, Cross York Street
